00017 package WeBWorK::Authen::Cosign;
00018 use base qw/WeBWorK::Authen/;
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::Authen::Cosign - Authentication plug in for cosign
00023 
00024 to use: include in global.conf or course.conf
00025   $authen{user_module} = "WeBWorK::Authen::Cosign";
00026 and add /webwork2 or /webwork2/courseName as a CosignProtected
00027 Location
00028 
00029 if $r->ce->{cosignoff} is set for a course, authentication reverts
00030 to standard WeBWorK authentication.
00031 
00032 =cut
00033 
00034 use strict;
00035 use warnings;
00036 use WeBWorK::Debug;
00037 
00038 # this is similar to the method in the base class, except that cosign 
00039 # ensures that we don't get to the address without a login.  this means
00040 # that we can't allow guest logins, but don't have to do any password
00041 # checking or cookie management.
00042 
00043 sub get_credentials {
00044     my ($self) = @_;
00045     my $r = $self->{r};
00046     my $ce = $r->ce;
00047     my $db = $r->db;
00048     
00049     if ( $ce->{cosignoff} ) {
00050         return $self->SUPER::get_credentials( @_ );
00051     } else {
00052         if ( defined( $ENV{'REMOTE_USER'} ) ) {
00053             $self->{'user_id'} = $ENV{'REMOTE_USER'};
00054             $self->{r}->param("user", $ENV{'REMOTE_USER'});
00055         } else {
00056             return 0;
00057         }
00058         # set external auth parameter so that Login.pm knows
00059         #    not to rely on internal logins if there's a check_user
00060         #    failure.
00061         $self->{external_auth} = 1;
00062 
00063         # the session key isn't used (cosign is managing this 
00064         #    for us), and we want to force checking against the 
00065         #    site_checkPassword
00066         $self->{'session_key'} = undef;
00067         $self->{'password'} = 1;
00068         $self->{'credential_source'} = "params";
00069 
00070         return 1;
00071     }
00072 }
00073 
00074 sub site_checkPassword { 
00075     my ( $self, $userID, $clearTextPassword ) = @_;
00076 
00077     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{cosignoff} ) {
00078         return $self->SUPER::checkPassword( @_ );
00079     } else {
00080         # this is easy; if we're here at all, we've authenticated
00081         # through cosign
00082         return 1;
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 # disable cookie functionality
00087 sub maybe_send_cookie {
00088     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00089     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{cosignoff} ) {
00090         return $self->SUPER::maybe_send_cookie( @_ );
00091     } else {
00092         # nothing to do here
00093     }
00094 }
00095 sub fetchCookie {
00096     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00097     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{cosignoff} ) {
00098         return $self->SUPER::fetchCookie( @_ );
00099     } else {
00100         # nothing to do here
00101     }
00102 }
00103 sub sendCookie {
00104     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00105     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{cosignoff} ) {
00106         return $self->SUPER::sendCookie( @_ );
00107     } else {
00108         # nothing to do here
00109     }
00110 }
00111 sub killCookie {
00112     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00113     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{cosignoff} ) {
00114         return $self->SUPER::killCookie( @_ );
00115     } else {
00116         # nothing to do here
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 # this is a bit of a cheat, because it does the redirect away from the
00121 #   logout script or what have you, but I don't see a way around that.
00122 sub forget_verification { 
00123     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00124     my $r = $self->{r};
00125 
00126     if ( $r->ce->{cosignoff} ) {
00127         return $self->SUPER::forget_verification( @_ );
00128     } else {
00129         $self->{was_verified} = 0;
00130 #       $r->headers_out->{"Location"} = $r->ce->{cosign_logout_script};
00131 #       $r->send_http_header;
00132 #       return;
00133         $self->{redirect} = $r->ce->{cosign_logout_script};
00134     }
00135 }
